title: Can we imagine flying cars? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah, I can imagine flying cars, but hopefully that can only be operated in an automated mode with collision avoidance technology built in. I just can imagine allowing people who are already challenged while driving in a 2 dimensional environment being let loose in an uncontrolled 3 dimensional environment. Even those of us on the ground wouldn’t be safe with all the stuff that would fall out of the sky.

Yeah I can. There is a tiny group who can afford them. There is a tiny group who have the ability to gain licences for them. Of that group a tiny number who might consider one. Of that group few could actually use one. Why? Go watch a helicopter land or take off. Bet it's noisy. So will a flying car. As noisy as a subway train. Yeah your neighbours will love that. Really.
